Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
The ADE toolbar provides the symbol in all the ADE views. When you click the icon, the publish dialog appears. Here you can choose which resources you want to publish. In the traditional workplace, the menu bar also provides a publish option and in the context menu of resources in the explorer view, a direct publish option is available as well.

What you should note is, pressing the publish icon when editing content (via inline or form-based editor) will automatically result in storing the content - whether you cancel publishing or not.

In addition to the option to publish directly,Â scheduled publishing is also available.
